General.Name: Rupa & Company Limited
General.Description: Rupa & Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the manufacture and sale of hosiery products for men, women, and kids in India and internationally. It offers vests, briefs, inners, drawers, bermudas, tracks and muscle tees, capri, T-shirts, socks, hoodie, and thermals for men; bras, panties, camisole, leggings, capri, T-shirts, kurti pants, hoodie, palazzos, thermal uppers and lowers, and socks for women; and T-shirts, bermudas, shorts, thermals, and socks for kids. The company offers its products under the Frontline, Macroman, Jon, Footline, Macroman M-series, Macrowoman W-series, Euro, Bumchums, Torrido, Thermocot, Kidline, FCUK, Fruit of the Loom, Femmora, and Softline brand name. It also generates power through a windmill. The company sells its products through retail outlets and various e-commerce portals, as well as through exclusive brand outlets and dealers. Rupa & Company Limited was founded in 1968 and is based in Kolkata, India.

8.Name: Mr. Vikash  Agarwal
8.Title: Additional Whole-Time Director & Pres of Fin.
